evaluation.answer: The ideal spark plug gap recommended is between 0.8-0.9 mm. This gap should be checked using a wire-type feeler gauge, and adjusted carefully if necessary.

evaluation.answer: Yes, the vehicle comes equipped with tubeless tires for both the front (80/100-18 47P) and rear (90/90-18 51P). The policy context explicitly states these specifications and advises against installing tubes, as the rims are designed for tubeless tires.

evaluation.answer: No, it is not compulsory to have a disc brake. The policy context refers to both "Disc variant" and "Drum variant" for the front brake, indicating that the vehicle is available with either type of braking system.

performance and service life of the engine.

racing oils are not recommended.

control system or other equipment can also 
make your vehicle illegal.
‚Ä¢ Always lock the steering and never leave the 
key in the ignition switch. This sounds 
simple but people do forget.
‚Ä¢ Park your vehicle in a locked garage 
whenever possible.
‚Ä¢ Use an additional anti-theft device of good 
quality.
‚Ä¢ Enter your name, address and phone 
number in this Owner's Manual and keep it 
in your vehicle at all times. Many times 
stolen vehicles are identified by information 
in the Owner's Manuals that are still with 
them.
‚Ä¢ Never park your vehicle in an isolated area. 
Park as far a

evaluation.answer: No, you cannot use 'Thums Up' instead of oil. The policy explicitly requires the use of Hero genuine engine oil or recommended grade SAE 10W 30 SL Grade (JASO MA2), specifically Hero 4T plus. Using an incompatible liquid like a carbonated beverage will cause serious engine damage and void your vehicle's warranty.
